options.label: Occupancy timeout
options.name: occupancy_timeout

options.description: Sends a message the last time occupancy (occupancy: true) was detected. When setting this for example to [10, 60] a `{"no_occupancy_since": 10}` will be send after 10 seconds and a `{"no_occupancy_since": 60}` after 60 seconds.
options.label: No occupancy since
options.name: no_occupancy_since

exposes.description: Indicates whether the device detected occupancy
exposes.label: Occupancy
exposes.name: occupancy

exposes.description: Select motion sensitivity to use. Press pairing button right before changing this otherwise it will fail.
exposes.label: Motion sensitivity
exposes.name: motion_sensitivity

exposes.description: Time interval between action detection. Press pairing button right before changing this otherwise it will fail.
exposes.label: Detection interval
exposes.name: detection_interval

exposes.description: When this option is enabled then blue LED will blink once when motion is detected. Press pairing button right before changing this otherwise it will fail.

options.label: Device temperature calibration
options.name: device_temperature_calibration

options.description: Time in seconds after which occupancy is cleared after detecting it (default is "detection_interval" + 2 seconds). The value must be equal to or greater than "detection_interval", and it can also be a fraction.
options.label: Occupancy timeout
options.name: occupancy_timeout

options.description: Sends a message the last time occupancy (occupancy: true) was detected. When setting this for example to [10, 60] a `{"no_occupancy_since": 10}` will be send after 10 seconds and a `{"no_occupancy_since": 60}` after 60 seconds.
options.label: No occupancy since
options.name: no_occupancy_since

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for energy, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Energy precision
options.name: energy_precision

options.description: State actions will also be published as 'action' when true (default false).
options.label: State action
options.name: state_action

features.description: Color temperature after cold power on of this light
features.label: Color temp startup
features.name: color_temp_startup

presets.description: Restore previous color_temp on cold power on
presets.name: previous

features.description: Color of this light in the CIE 1931 color space (x/y)
features.label: Color (X/Y)
features.name: color_xy

features.description: Color of this light expressed as hue/saturation
features.label: Color (HS)
features.name: color_hs

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.label: Effect
exposes.name: effect

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.label: Transition
options.name: transition

options.description: When enabled colors will be synced, e.g. if the light supports both color x/y and color temperature a conversion from color x/y to color temperature will be done when setting the x/y color (default true).
options.label: Color sync
options.name: color_sync

options.description: State actions will also be published as 'action' when true (default false).
options.label: State action
options.name: state_action

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Temperature calibration
options.name: temperature_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Temperature precision
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the humidity value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Humidity calibration
options.name: humidity_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for humidity, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Humidity precision
options.name: humidity_precision

options.description: Calibrates the co2 value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Co2 calibration
options.name: co2_calibration

options.description: Calibrates the voc value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Voc calibration
options.name: voc_calibration

options.description: Calibrates the formaldehyd value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Formaldehyd calibration
options.name: formaldehyd_calibration

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.label: Effect
exposes.name: effect

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.label: Transition
options.name: transition

options.description: State actions will also be published as 'action' when true (default false).
options.label: State action
options.name: state_action

features.description: Color of this light in the CIE 1931 color space (x/y)
features.label: Color (X/Y)
features.name: color_xy

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.label: Effect
exposes.name: effect

exposes.description: Do not disturb mode, when enabled this function will keep the light OFF after a power outage
exposes.label: Do not disturb
exposes.name: do_not_disturb
